title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.261 - Meat loaf
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.261 - Meat loaf

State Regulations

Meat Loaf is a cooked meat food product in loaf form
made from comminuted meat. To facilitate chopping or mixing, water or ice may
be used in an amount not to exceed three percent of the total ingredients
used. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1

319.261

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
